product_name: Nikwax Nubuck and Suede Spray Care Kit - 4.2 fl. oz.
long_description: This convenient Nikwax Nubuck and Suede Spray care kit includes cleaning gel and a waterproofing agent for nubuck and suede leather footwear such as hiking boots, winter boots and more. Nikwax water-based products are nontoxic and contain no harmful solvents, fluorocarbons or propellants. Handy gel cleaner works on all suede, nubuck or smooth-finish leathers and fabric. Cleaner removes stubborn dirt and wax left by previous waterproofing applications; preps your boots for a fresh application of Nikwax treatment. Cleaner is formulated to retain leather's water repellency, unlike other cleaners that strip the leather of its natural oils. Cleaner is recommended for Gore-Tex(R) and eVent(R) footwear. Water-based liquid wax restores water repellency to nubuck and suede leather footwear. Wax contains mineral waxes, flexible polymers and tanning agents to condition and protect leather without over-softening or changing the fit. Wax will darken and wax down leather and suede-test on inconspicuous spot first. Wax is recommended for Gore-Tex and eVent footwear.
short_description: This convenient Nikwax Nubuck and Suede Spray care kit includes cleaning gel and a waterproofing agent for nubuck and suede leather footwear such as hiking boots, winter boots and more.
